item.description:
Enneagram at the Movies

We'll see a great movie (Midnight in Paris) and clarify all the characters regarding type and type relationship dynamics - a perfect way to deepen your knowledge of the Enneagram. We'll stop and start the movie to clearly see types showing up in the movie, including subtypes. Lots of fun.

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is a personal types expert. He's a therapist and coach, workshop leader and trainer in organization for team building and staff development regarding working together effectively.

www.herbpearce.com

781 648 3737

herb@herbpearce.com

Dinner and snacks provided!

Dinner 7:30 Movie 8:15-11pm
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, corner of Tanager, Wollaston and West St.
item.name: Enneagram at the Movies - Midnight in Paris
